document.full_text: fitch cut greece's credit rating by three notches on friday, pushing the country deeper into junk territory, and warned that any kind of debt restructuring would amount to default.
document.title: fitch cuts greek rating, warns over restructuring
lines_and_colors: fitch cut greece's credit rating by three notches on friday, pushing the country deeper into junk territory, and warned that any kind of debt restructuring would amount to default.
